task_summary: Place the blue bottle down onto the table surface and safely retreat.

task_long_description.overview: A 6-DOF robotic arm operates over a white tabletop scattered with small objects (bottles, cups, can). The instruction is to place down the blue bottle. From the frames, the gripper hovers above the center region and descends, consistent with a placing maneuver. We assume the blue bottle is already held in the gripper. The behavior moves above a chosen place zone, lowers until contact with the table, opens the gripper to release, retreats, and pauses briefly to stabilize.
preconditions: Blue bottle grasped in the gripper
stepwise_plan: Verify the blue bottle is in the gripper.
Move above the intended place zone with a small vertical offset.
Lower until contact is detected at low force and limited depth.
Open the gripper to release the blue bottle.
Wait shortly to ensure object settles.
success_criteria: Blue bottle released on the tabletop without toppling
Gripper ends clear of the scene
failure_and_recovery: If contact not detected: re-approach and attempt lowering again.
If release fails: re-open gripper and retry after slight retreat.
If placement unstable: retreat, re-approach, and repeat with smaller descent.
task_long_description.termination: Behavior ends after retreat and brief wait once the bottle is released.

frame_3.now_evidence: End-effector centered over table and descending; aligns with imminent placement.
frame_3.predicts_next: Gripper opening expected soon; confirms goal location.

node_specs.description: Ensure the blue bottle is currently held.
Position above the chosen place area with a small vertical offset.
Descend until contact with the table is detected at low force.
Release the bottle by opening the gripper.
Back off from the placed object to a safe clearance.

failure_modes: No contact detected due to height error
Bottle sticks in gripper and does not release
Bottle tips due to uneven release or contact with neighbors
recovery_strategy: Retry descent with small offset change
Re-open gripper after micro-lift and re-place
Adjust place zone slightly and repeat sequence
assumptions: Frames suggest the robot is in a placing motion at the table center; we assume the blue bottle is already in the gripper though it may not be visually distinct in every tile.
Symbolic target 'place_zone' denotes the central tabletop area.

expected_success_criteria: Bottle released on table; gripper clears without collision; scene remains stable.
